name: Balloon Pop Mania
description:
Balloon Pop Mania is a fun physics game for children. Very easy and intuitive to play, but it will be hard to stop playing.

Featuring multiple gameplay modes, fast and slow paced gameplay, and a whole lot of fun for the whole family.

Dynamically changing scenery, so that each play session has a different feel.

Track High Scores for each mode as well as overall gameplay statistics.

Your goal is to keep the balloons above the bottom strikes line by tapping on them.


Enjoy 4 different game modes: Float, Pop, Free Pop, and Free Float

The first one is a float mode where you tap and try to juggle the balloons within a bonus area, trying to keep them away from the spikes.

The second is a pop mode where you try to pop all the balloons before they hit the spikes.

The final two modes are simple variations of the first two, with no negative outcome just for a relaxing fun way to play with balloons.


Features:

- Simple enough for children
- Stunning design with fantastic background music and sound effects
- 4 gameplay styles featuring two relaxing mode
- Stats page with various in game statistics and progress
- Sound Sliders


Good luck and have fun!
